subject: Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: Belize may be the best place for a flyfisher to score a grand slam by catching a bonefish, a tarpon, and a permit on a fly, all in the same day.
snippet: Belize may be the best place for a flyfisher to score a grand slam by catching a bonefish, a tarpon, and a permit on a fly, all in the same day.
